title: Episode 43: Brave Despair
description:
The British Mediterranean Fleet under Horatio Nelson spends months chasing the naval component of the Egypt Expedition. They finally catch the French at Aboukir Bay and fight the decisive Battle of the Nile, which would have major consequences for Napoleon and his army, and reverberate in geopolitics and culture for decades.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
